```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(dplyr)
library(reactable)

# Load data
owner_sum_debug <- readRDS("owner_sum_debug.rds")

tbl <- owner_sum_debug %>%
  select(
    Owner, avg_rank, adj_avg_rank,
    titles, five_set_wins, grass_wins,
    aces_per_service_point, dfs_per_service_point,
    bagels_surrendered,
    adj_titles, adj_five_set, adj_grass,
    adj_aces, adj_bagels, adj_dfs, adj
  ) %>%
  arrange(adj_avg_rank)

reactable(
  tbl,
  searchable = TRUE,
  defaultSorted = "adj_avg_rank",
  defaultSortOrder = "asc",
  pagination = TRUE,
  highlight = TRUE,
  bordered = TRUE,
  striped = TRUE
)
```
